greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k), 0<=k<=n, given by (0, 1, 1, 1, 2, 1, 3, 1, 4, 1, 5, 1, ...) DELTA (1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, ...) where DELTA is the operator defined in A084938.
comment: Bell convolution triangle ; g.f. for column k : (x*B(x))^k with  B(x) g.f. for A000110 (Bell numbers).
Riordan array (1, x*B(x)), when B(x) the g.f. of A000110.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..140, flattened
results.author: _Philippe Deléham_, Jan 29 2012
